reviews.customers_say: Customers find this summer dress cute, comfortable, and perfect for beach vacations, with vibrant colors that look amazing against darker hair. The dress fits nicely and is well-made, though opinions about the fabric material are mixed, with some praising it while others describe it as thin and cheap. Customers appreciate its lightweight nature, making it suitable for warm weather and Florida heat. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful must have summer piece!
items.body: AMAZING dress! Flattering! I ordered a Large (and an XL just in case) The LG fit perfectly. I am a 36DD or 36E in bra size (with broad shoulders) and the bust fit perfectly. I am carrying extra weight right now, all in my mid section, and this dress flowed perfectly over it. I wore it to an outdoor wedding. I got the Sky Blue. I did wear a tank under it - the ANRABESS Women's sleeveless scoop neck tank top ribbed fitted in khaki and it was the perfect match. The material is soft & flowy. Very comfortable. It came right out of the package without wrinkles and I did not have to iron it!!! My friend liked it so much she made me send her the link so she could order the same one. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable flowy good fabric
items.body: Love this dress. I want three more! Nice weight from ruffle at the bottom, feels substantial and flowy at the same time I will likely get more of these, wore it in my Hawaiian vacation! So pretty, vibrant colors Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good price point for casual wear
items.body: Really cute and a nice fabric and nice colors of blue with grey on an off white background. It is a regular fit, not a petite so it is a bit long for me. My experience is that it will shrink a bit when washed and I recommend hang to dry. Great house dress! Read more
items.author: jilnu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I love this dress. The color and.patterns are beautiful and it very comfortable. It works as a casual dress or can be dressed up with heels and jewelry. The fit is great and fits to size. Perfect warm weather dress. Read more

items.author: Tamara Graham

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Flowy, and Perfect for Summer!
items.body: I really like this dress, it's not only beautiful, it feels good to wear too. I got the Dokotoo maxi dress in X-Large (Sky Blue 1) Boho Floral Print. - For reference, I’m 5'4", about 182 lbs, with a 37" waist and a pear-shaped figure. The fit was flattering, and fairly comfortable for what I like in a comfy dress. The fabric feels really nice and lightweight, perfect for warm weather, as I live in a very hot Southern state in the US. I love that the hem hits right at my ankles, exactly the length I like. The adjustable tie straps make it easy to get the fit just right, and the flowy ruffle hem adds a cute, boho touch. Overall, it's a great dress for summer, whether you're heading out or just want something easy and breezy to wear. I’d definitely consider getting it in another color! Read more
items.author: Qtpie Reviews

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s perfect!
items.body: Material is nice and silky - no ironing needed fits true to size. Length and bust measurements are a perfect fit. Will order in more colors. Read more
items.author: Veronica Longoria

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky Blue, Sky Blue 1, White, Blue, Purple, Multicolor, Rose, Orange, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.
